content:
As I'm working on implementing search parameters, I noticed that there's a discrepancy around the :of-type modifier:
The search page defines this as of-type while in the examples on that page otype has been used â€“which seems to be just a typo.
However, in the JSON definitions on the registry page, this is recorded as ofType (see line 450 of the JSON file for example).
I wondered if this has been reported already. If not I'll be happy to file a CR.
